weekly_top_story.headline: Medicare Telehealth Policy to Tighten Significantly on October 1, 2025
weekly_top_story.summary: Starting October 1, Medicare will reinstate pre-pandemic restrictions on telehealth services, limiting coverage for audio-only visits and telehealth home-originated services, which could reduce access to virtual care and impact mental health and rural providers significantly.

stories.headline: Cigna Implements New Evaluation & Management Downcoding Policy Beginning October 1, 2025
stories.summary: Cigna's new medical reimbursement policy will automatically downcode certain Evaluation & Management claims to enforce coding accuracy in alignment with AMA guidelines, affecting providers with higher-than-average coding patterns starting October 1.

stories.headline: North Carolina Medicaid Providers Face Rate Reductions Effective October 1, 2025
stories.summary: Rate reductions mandated by the North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services will impact all LME/MCOs and providers across North Carolina starting October 1, potentially stressing provider operations and access to care.
